title: Power Cuts: PUCSL releases schedule from 13th – 19th June
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); the Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka published the approved schedule for Power Cuts from 13th June to 19th June.
Indian Rupee Tumbles Past 78 Per Dollar Amid Global Risk-Off
Traders can face up to Rs. 500,000 in fines & 6 months in prison for selling rice at high prices
